attributes.action: stop deducting child benefit payments from income support recipients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On your own admission child poverty in the UK is a fact, yet the government in effect steals from children the child benefit that is allowed by classing it as income and deducting it from income support payments. Growing children constantly need clothes and shoes which these payments should go to pay for as well as in school and outsided school activities. These children are being deprived of what is lawfully theirs
